cast.overview: The kingdom is in a festive mood as everyone gathers for the royal wedding of Rapunzel and Flynn. However, when Pascal and Maximus, as flower chameleon and ring bearer, respectively, lose the gold bands, a frenzied search and recovery mission gets underway. As the desperate duo tries to find the rings before anyone discovers that they’re missing, they leave behind a trail of comical chaos that includes flying lanterns, a flock of doves, a wine barrel barricade and a very sticky finale. Will Maximus and Pascal save the day and make it to the church in time? And will they ever get Flynn’s nose right?
cast.title: Tangled Ever After

details.biography: Erin Matthews was born in Portland, Oregon, on February 6, 1973. She is known for her voiceover work, in addition to performances on stage and screen. She is married to writer/actor Jon Eidson (Extremely Decent, Heathers: The Musical). They reside in Los Angeles, California, with their dog daughter, Lady. She can be found on Instagram @erinmatthews73.
details.name: Erin Matthews
